author: Reuters Editorial
title: Swiss stocks - Factors to watch on April 19
text:
ZURICH, April 19 (Reuters) - Here are some of the main factors that may affect Swiss stocks on Thursday.
NESTLE The food-maker is due to report its first quarter sales, with analaysts polled by Reuters expecting an organic growth rate of 2.5 percent.
For more news, click on
NOVARTIS The pharmaceuticals company is due to report its first quarter earnings, with analysts polled by Reuters expecting sales to rise 6.2 percent to $12.26 billion.
For more news, click on
ABB The engineering company is due to report its first quarter earnings, with analysts polled by Reuters expecting a 6.8 percent increase in revenues to $8.39 billion.
For more news, click on
COMPANY STATEMENTS * Temenos on Wednesday reported non-IFRS operating profit up 33 percent during its first quarter.
Reporting by Zurich newsroom
